attributes.action: Forced changes to Brighton & Hove City Council's unique committee system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We call on the Government to reconsider its proposal to force Brighton & Hove City Council to change its unique and democratic committee system to an Executive model.

The committee system was overwhelmingly chosen over an elected Mayor by the residents of Brighton and Hove to ensure that the Council's system of governance remains as pluralistic, transparent and accountable as possible.  This has become particularly important in the circumstance of a hung council.
